title: (EU) 2023/175 of 26 January 20231, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Extraction Solvents used in the Production of Foodstuffs and Food 
Ingredients) (Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

(2) The Principal Regulations, the European Communities (Extraction 
Solvents used in the Production of Foodstuffs and Food Ingredients) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 129 of 2011), the Regulations of 
2018 and these Regulations may be cited together as the European 
Communities (Extraction Solvents used in the Production of Foodstuffs and 
Food Ingredients) Regulations 2010 to 2024.

title: (EU) 2023/175 of 26 January 20231, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations— 

“Principal Regulations” means the European Communities (Extraction 
Solvents used in the Production of Foodstuffs and Food Ingredients) 
Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 119 of 2010); 

“Regulations of 2018” means the European Communities (Extraction 
Solvents used in the Production of Foodstuffs and Food Ingredients) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 190 of 2018).

title: (EU) 2023/175 of 26 January 20231, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations (as last amended by
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations (as last amended by 
Regulation 3 of the Regulations of 2018) is amended by substituting for the 
definition of “Directive” the following: 

“‘Directive’ means Directive 2009/32/EC of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 23 April 20092 as amended by Commission Directive 
2010/59/EU of 26 August 20103, Commission Directive (EU) 2016/1855 of 
19 October 20164 and Commission Directive (EU) 2023/175 of 26 January 
20231;”. 

1 OJ No. L 25, 27.1.2023, p. 67. 
2 OJ No. L 141, 6.6.2009, p. 3. 
3 OJ No. L 225, 27.8.2010, p. 10. 
4 OJ No. L 284, 20.10.2016, p. 19. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [638] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 November, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [638]

title: (EU) 2023/175 of 26 January 20231, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to Commission Directive (EU) 2023/175 of 26 
January 2023 amending Directive 2009/32/EC of the European Parliament 
and of the Council as regards 2-methyloxolane. 

The Annex to Directive 2009/32/EC lists the extraction solvents for which 
conditions of use are specified with details of “name”, “conditions of use” 
and “maximum residue limits in the extracted foodstuff or food ingredient” 
set out in table format. “2-methyloxolane” is added to that list by Commission 
Directive (EU) 2023/175 of 26 January 2023 and its “conditions of use” and 
“maximum residue limits in the extracted foodstuff or food ingredient” are 
specified. 

These Regulations amend the European Communities (Extraction Solvents 
used in the Production of Foodstuffs and Food Ingredients) Regulations 2010 
(S.I. No. 119 of 2010) in the manner specified in these Regulations. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (Extraction 
Solvents used in the Production of Foodstuffs and Food Ingredients) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [638] 5 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
